Name: Clarita
Ingredients: 10 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
5 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
1 dash Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass.
Review: Dry (at least with the amontillado sherry) we used, Clarita could be enjoyed as an aperitif or digestive.
History: The winning Bacardí Legacy 2017 cocktail, created by Ran Van Ongevalle at The Pharmacy I Knokke, Heist, Belgium.
